content: Yes! I was going to write an article similar to this myself (“Why concept art is bullshit”), but happy you did it. Muzli have been so criminal for reposting nonsense like this under the veil ‘Design Inspiration’. That Google redesign would be so intense on your eyes too! Going on Dribbble and typing in ‘[company] redesign’ yields some absolutely great results. All have lovely colours. All make absolutely no sense
